entry.title: GoblinTown Is the PFP We Deserve. But Is It All Just a Big Joke?
entry.summary: Unless you’ve been living under an Ether rock for the past week, chances are you’ve heard of Goblin Town, the free-to-mint collection of 10,000 ugly bastards taking the NFT space by storm, and turning the rule book on its head. The 24hr trading volume alone is dizzying stuff. And the floor just keeps on rising. … GoblinTown Is the PFP We Deserve. But Is It All Just a Big Joke? Read More »

entry.title: $26.5M NYC Building Listed on OpenSea
entry.summary: A seven-story building in Manhattan’s Flatiron District has been listed for sale as an NFT on OpenSea.
